name: Master Juggler - addictive mini casual game
name_original: Master Juggler - addictive mini casual game
description:
Master Juggler is a mini casual game where player juggles several objects to keep them on the air as long as possible. Level is passed whenever the required juggling number has been met. Coins are earned based on obtaining points or using rewarded ads. Additionally player can catch time freezing bomb to lock all falling balls in mid air and trigger combos!!!

FEATURE

- Simple mechanism, easy to play difficult to master
- Fun and addictive gameplay, as the level progresses more balls are added to create more challenges
- 50 unlockable items which player can trade coins to unlock them
- Up to 24 levels designed for any skill level
- Configurable gameplay including difficulty, gravity, ball size
- Configureable look and feel including touch color, background color
- Super fun time freezing bomb, earn even more points with combo execution
